Array: Gah! Where's that strength coming from!?
Captain was right, the Dweller's grasp is too strong...
Can't we go in? Maybe it's not too late!
We'd never be able to break that barrier. Even the Headmaster will need the eclipse to get us through.
Can't help anyone if we die in vain.
Anyway, we'll save him during the cleansing, right?
No point staying here, then. Let's go wait for the others.
YOU CAN'T TAKE HIM!! THAT'S NOT FAIR!!
I was hoping we would meet under different circumstances...
This is numbing poison. Your friend's mind is still being controlled, but his body won't act.
It's a longshot, but if we hurry we might be able to fetch a <color=magic>soul stone</color> before the poison wears off.
<color=bad>Someone</color> on this island uses them to remain free of the Dweller's grasp.
If we get one, it should consume the mind control spell on your friend.
I know just the place, but...
What are we waiting for, then?
I'm fine. Let's take him back to the inn first.
We must make haste. Over here.
This shortcut will help. Lead the way.
A mysterious assassin joins the party!
If it's always dark here, how will we know when the eclipse happens?
The curse of the Night Shroud is strong, but it won't withstand the eclipse.
Quickly now. Our window is short.
Your friend doesn't have much time. Let's use the shortcut to the right.
There's no time. We must hurry back to Lucent.
Brambles are blocking the way. We should find their source.
